meanings.definition: The quality or state of being coordinated.
meanings.sent1: Her dance performance displayed perfect coordinateness.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork requires good coordinateness among members.
meanings.sent3: The coordinateness of the synchronized swimmers amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The coordinateness of the orchestra was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The coordinateness of the traffic flow was disrupted by the accident.

meanings.definition: The ability to work together harmoniously.
meanings.sent1: Their coordinateness in solving problems made them a great team.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project depended on the coordinateness of the departments.
meanings.sent3: The coordinateness of the chefs in the kitchen led to a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The coordinateness of the dancers was like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The coordinateness of the bees in the hive was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing or arranging in a harmonious way.
meanings.sent1: The coordinateness of the event planning ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The coordinateness of the colors in the painting created a beautiful composition.
meanings.sent3: The coordinateness of the garden layout made it a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent4: The coordinateness of the furniture arrangement made the room feel spacious.
meanings.sent5: The coordinateness of the music notes formed a delightful melody.
